INSTLIB::CONTROL_STATS_EVENT_ADDRESS

INT32 CheckKnobs (CONTROL_STATS_HANDLER ch, VOID *val)

Detailed Description

The address specified for a stats controller can be a hex address, a symbol, a symbol with an occurence-count, an offset in an image, It can also have the :rearm qualifier which causes the alarm to rearm itself after event occurs.
